::EndBringer/Greven/Killfest::

EndBringer jumps upward, getting out of the way of the grenade 
explosion and the optic blasts. He fires four more ES missiles (two 
from both guns) as he comes back down, all four flying at Demon Wulf 
as EndBringer charges at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven sees that his attacks havn't been returned, and fires three 
missiles, two energy seeking from one gun and one normal from 
another, all at Flesh Ripper.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest calmly walks toward Dark Claw, firing two missiles and three 
EMP blasts at him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Sorry, Tavatron, you kinda posted a little late.  The Brotherhood 
already 
> retreated back towards their base.  They're not close enough to 
fire upon 
> targets or be fired upon themselves.
> 
> The fact of the matter, Icedemon, is Rattrap fired two shots at 
incoming 
> missiles, then twenty-five shots at Unicron, all in the same post.  
That's a 
> mode.  If he had two guns that's ok.  As for Unicron firing three 
missiles, 
> he has two weapons that can fire missiles making able to fire a 
max. of four 
> missiles.)
> 
> (In other news three cheers for the Great One, THE ROCK, for 
beating down 
> Kurt Angle and become the first six time WWF championship winner in 
WWF 
> history!)
> 
> Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/The Protectobots\Shockwave:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Demon Wulf, though big, was able to fall to his left, the incoming 
shots 
> coming from Cinder and Blades go past him and head for the 
missiles, the one 
> remaining impacting with his back and almost knocking him over, but 
he was 
> relatively ok.
> 
> Turning around, he raised a hand, a yellow orb with the power of a 
small 
> grenade launching out at Endbringer. 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper turned around, a black orb forming in his hand.  The 
Vok warrior 
> threw the ball of energy, using his mind to prematurely make it 
explode and 
> intercept the four missiles heading for him.  He laughed, feeling 
several 
> objects strike him but not doing any harm.  He turned, laughing at 
the spears 
> at his feet.  "You'll have to do better than that he said," kicking 
at the 
> spears and sending two through the air at Aqua's sternum.  Turning 
his head 
> to the left he fired off fifteen rapid optic blasts at EndBringer.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw detected a large object heading for him.  His first 
thought was it 
> was some huge missile, but he detected the signature of a Maximal.  
Deciding 
> not to wait to find out what it was exactly, he started up his 
engines and 
> drove forward at top speed, a missile striking him (From Jen's 
char.) and 
> making a slight crater in his armor but nothing to serious.  One 
missile port 
> in his attack vehicle mode targeted the CF and launched two 
missiles at it.  
> 
> As he continued on a welding laser struck him but didn't penetrate 
his armor.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot drove at top speed, at the current speed he knew he'd hit 
that Vok 
> idiot.  But the Vok warrior was moving, and was now out of his 
way!  Almost 
> absentmindedly while checking in on the other Protectobots, drove 
into three 
> missiles intended for Dark Wolf.
> 
> The fourth and last in the row intended for the Vok war machine had 
avoided 
> the large object in its path and kept on going.  The force of the 
three 
> explosions sent the fire truck flipping in Dark Wolf's general 
direction, and 
> as the missile struck the back of the Vok and doing slight damage, 
Hot Spot 
> slammed into the back of the tank, knocking it forward a few meters.
> 
> Hot Spot tried to transform to biped mode but it was to painful.  
This was 
> not his week.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove looked to Hot Spot as he saw the crash and Flesh Ripper, and 
then 
> fired a small amount of freezing gass towards Flesh Ripper's left 
knee joint.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades flew over towards Hot Spot and hovered above him, making 
deep scans to 
> determine if his leader needed a CR immediately.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid saw that his welding laser didn't work, but didn't have 
much time 
> to think on it as a missile exploded into his back from a very 
close range, 
> sending First Aid flipping forward and crashing to his feet several 
feet from 
> the source of the missile.
> ---
> 
> Streetwise continued gaining speed, and was only a dozen meters 
from Demon 
> Wulf, and the Vok hadn't noticed him.
> 
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave watched with joy as First Aid fell.  Not quite turning 
around, he 
> raised his left arm and fired off five rapid blasts, from the long 
barrel 
> that was at the end of his arm where a hand should be, at Mantle's 
torso.
> 
> Raising his right arm in which a white hand held a missile 
launcher, the 
> robot fired off two rockets from his missile launcher at the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire.
